column4: As of recently I've discovered that anything I delete while in nautilus after doing ; sudo nautilus > that I am not actually deleting files... Rather when I ask it to move files to trash they just disappear ... but the space that they took up still remains yet I look in trash and NOTHING is there... so I was wandering wtf I should do or if this is a known bug ?
where might I find that slart ?
cause I have 130 gigs sitting idle somewhere
none that i have ever seen
